article_title: In NC, health insurance rates vary widely, depending on where you live
article_text: North Carolina continues to have some of the highest health insurance costs in the United States. Pockets of the state have the distinction of being among the most expensive 10 percent of U.S. counties for individual health insurance.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Rates, Rating, Areas, ACA, Affordable Care Act, Insurance
article_metadata.title: In NC, health insurance rates vary widely, depending on where you live | The Charlotte Observer
